default.toml.title: Style Inlining
default.toml.description: Inline a CSS stylesheet into HTML.

css-animations.toml.title: CSS Animations
css-animations.toml.description: Use predefined animations available on Cohost.

lesscss-files.toml.title: LessCSS Variables
lesscss-files.toml.description: Use LessCSS variables to include files as background images.

scss-files.toml.title: Sass Modules
scss-files.toml.description: Use Sass modules to include files as background images.

svelte-templates.toml.title: Svelte Templating
svelte-templates.toml.description: Use Svelte components for various kinds of templating.

svelte-chat-log.toml.title: Svelte Chat Log
svelte-chat-log.toml.description: Use Svelte to create a simple chat log template.

slideshow.toml.title: Slideshow
slideshow.toml.description: Use Svelte and <details> to create a slideshow.

katex-mathml.toml.title: KaTeX MathML
katex-mathml.toml.description: Use KaTeX to easily render TeX markup to MathML.

animated-svg-background.toml.title: Animated SVG Background
animated-svg-background.toml.description: Use @keyframes to animate SVG elements and embed them as a background image.

svg-conditional-css.toml.title: Conditional CSS inside SVG
svg-conditional-css.toml.description: Use SVG backgrounds to trigger CSS animation with a click interaction.
